body.p: The text of the unaccompanied standard, IFRS 13, is contained in Part A of this edition. Its effective date when issued was 1 January 2013. The text of the Accompanying Guidance on IFRS 13 is contained in Part B of this edition.

ol.li:
APPENDIX TO THE BASIS FOR CONCLUSIONS
Amendments to the Basis for Conclusions on other IFRSs
